allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AIAAIC Database Scraper

A comprehensive scraper for the AIAAIC (AI, Algorithmic, and Automation
Incidents and Controversies) database with data quality tooling.

Features:
- CSV parsing from Google Sheets with 20+ fields
- Async page scraping with configurable concurrency
- Robust text-pattern extraction (handles Google Sites quirks)
- Plain text URL extraction (not just <a> tags)
- JSONL output format for resumability
- Rich terminal UI with progress bars
- Streamlit data quality inspector dashboard

CLI commands:
- scrape.py: Main scraper with --sample, --force, --retry-errors
- --single <ID>: Inspect individual incidents
- --incomplete / --rescrape-incomplete: Find and fix gaps
- --errors: View failed scrapes
- --export json/csv: Format conversion

Tech stack: Python 3.14+, uv, httpx, BeautifulSoup, Pydantic, Rich, Streamlit

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix README.md rendering and ignore .python-version

- Fix corrupted Unicode box-drawing characters in Project Structure section
  that prevented proper GitHub rendering
- Add .python-version to .gitignore (uv manages Python version)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Enhance data quality inspector with unified issue inspection

- Add markdownify for converting fetched pages to markdown (replaces broken iframe)
- Add has_typos() helper to detect known typos in issues field
- Extend Inspect page with all issue filters: missing desc/sources/date,
  no URL, not scraped, has typos, complete
- Handle records without URLs gracefully in Inspect page
- Add clickable rows to Gaps page with expandable detail panels
- Add "Has typos" tab to Gaps page
- Highlight typos with strikethrough and correction in metadata display
- Move st.set_page_config to top of file (Streamlit requirement)
- Add constants for cache TTL, page size, similarity threshold

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add direct ID lookup in Inspect page

- Add "Jump to ID" text input field next to the filter dropdown
- Case-insensitive ID matching
- If ID found in current filter, jumps directly to that record
- If ID exists but not in current filter, shows warning to switch filters
- If ID not found, shows error message

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")

Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap add CHANGELOG.md README.md scrape.py src/page_scraper.py src/scraper.py src/utils.py)

Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve description extraction and scraper performance

- Extract full multi-paragraph descriptions with narrative sections
  (What happened, Why it happened, What it means)
- Add `remove_ids_from_jsonl()` utility to prevent duplicates when
  using --retry-errors or --rescrape-incomplete
- Increase default concurrency from 10 to 20 parallel requests
- Fix --single mode TypeError with sync wrapper for page scraping
- Add metadata field patterns to detect end of description content

EOF
)")
Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap add CHANGELOG.md README.md app.py scrape.py src/utils.py data/aiaaic_incidents.jsonl)

Bash(git -C /Users/dbbz/MyProjects/AIAAIC_scrap commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add data consistency checking and deduplication tools

Features:
- `--check` CLI flag: validates data for duplicates, malformed records
- `--deduplicate` CLI flag: removes duplicates keeping best version
- Data Consistency page in Streamlit app with one-click deduplication
- Scoring system: newest scraped_at + longest description + most sources

The data file was deduplicated (4294 â†’ 2145 records), removing 2149
duplicate records created during re-scraping. Best versions kept based
on quality scoring.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

  green (Good 500-2k), blue (Long >2k)

- Quality indicators for very short and good length descriptions
